name: Debit And Credit:A Walk Through Accounting Hell
description: Bad accountants go to accounting hell. Complete an accountant's walk through accounting hell, solving puzzles and searching for save points. This is a college student's attempt at making an interactive problem set for Accounting Principle students.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel (R) Core i5-4300U 1.90HZ Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Intel (R) Core i5-4300U 1.90HZ Storage: 800 MB available space
